subject: [All Backer PTU] Star Citizen Alpha 4.2 PTU 9844762 Patch Notes

blocks.text: Star Citizen Alpha Patch 4.2
Alpha Patch 4.2 has been released to All Backers!  Patch should now show: VERSION 4.2.0-PTU.9844762.
Audience: All backers
Server Info: PTU Channel - US Only
Long Term Persistence: Enabled
Mesh Configuration: 5:5 - 600 Players
Starting aUEC: 15,000,000
Testing/Feedback Focus
Stability & Bugfixes
Storm Breaker All Phases
Lazarus Facility Freight Elevators
Apex Valakkar
Dynamic Rain
Radiation
VOLT Laser "Prism" Shotgun
ARGO ATLS IKTI, IKTI GEO, IKTI Rad (Version Found at Storm Breaker)
New Wikelo Ship Additions
New Hairstyles
Sterling Exploration Suit
Known Issues
Multivehicle - PU - Vehicles/ UI - Unable to Locate Ships or QT Back to Them After Bed Logging
PU - Orison - Locations / Transit - Some parts of the shuttle ramp has no collision
PU - Weapons / Reload - Audio / SFX - Permanent Ammo Repool Audio loop after spawning
PU - FPS - Heart monitor beeping never stops after being revived
PU - Storm Breaker - locations - Valakkar - Adult valakkar are spawning in the air the ground is sloped behind the tower
Multivehicle - PU - Vehicles / Quantum Travel - Ships streaming in or streaming out locations on a quantum travel jump has performance drops and frame freezing
Multivehicle - PU - Vehicles / Target lock - target lock is unlocked at random radar for targets is dropped
Multivehicle - PU - Vehicles / Target lock - target attacker stops working when a target lock is lost due to locking range or radar dropped
PU - mobiGlas - Asset Manager / NikNax - mobiGlas / Inventory / UI - The Assets Manager / NikNax app gets stuck at infinite loading and never loads assets
PU - Mining / Saddlebag / Cargo Grid - Argo and MISC Saddlebags do not snap to the Argo RAFT's Cargo Grid
PU - New Babbage / Brentworth Care Center - UI / Medical Screens - Check-in medical kiosk is stuck on “Checking availability” loading screen
Features & Gameplay
Gameplay
Storm Breaker and ASD Location Polish

Added one way freight elevators to Lazarus location allowing transfer of good from near the Apex Valakkar to outside at the transit facility. Further ASD location AI Pathing Polish. Apex Valakkar Arena Ground Polish.
Ships and Vehicles
Adjusted Excessive Polaris Ground Turbulence
Added Missing C8 Pisces Armor Damage Reduction Modifier
Core Tech
New Spawn Closet Subsumption logic to pause and reset auto spawn tasks. This will help limit locations to the amount of FPS AI we set for the area.
Further Server Performance Optimizations
Bug Fixes
Potential Fix: PU - Pyro I - Storm Breaker - Locations / UI / Missions - Egg Pylon timer out of sync with location cooldown

Potential Fix: PU - NPE / Tutorial - Mission / Location - There's a chance that the "Take an elevator to the tutorial ship's hangar" wouldn't update even after taking the elevator to tutorial ship's hangar
Potential Fix: Multivehicle - PU - Vehicles / SFX - Dynamic Weather - The rain SFX inside ships are the same as being outside in the rain
Potential Fix: PU - Storm Breaker - Pyro - Creatures / Collision - The Apex Valakkar has no collision once killed
Potential Fix: PU - Stanton - Performance - Mining / Game Code - Server and Client Performance drops when Shattering Large FPS Deposits
Potential Fix: RSI Ursa Rover ALL Variants - PU - Vehicles / SFX / Audio - Missing audio on opening and closing ramps and doors (STARC-171363)
Potential Fix: PU - Storm Breaker - locations - Valakkar - Adult valakkar are spawning in the air the ground is sloped behind the tower
Potential Fix: PU - Pyro - Storm Breaker - Locations - New safe codes do not open safes after streaming out / in if the safe has previously been opened
Technical
Fixed 5 Client Crash
Fixed 1 Server Crash

so sad :disappointed:
Hey CIG, can we get a few recent issues fixed?
These were worked on recently, so hopefully the fixes won’t be too difficult:

- TAC Turrets Alignment – The TAC turrets don’t properly follow the hull’s contour, particularly on the bottom, creating unnecessary dead zones that don’t align with CIG’s usual attention to detail. Could we also swap the S4s on top with the S5s on the sides? It makes more sense, considering ground-based personnel and vehicles don’t need S5s as much as ship-to-ship combat does. Given the gunboat role, adjusting weapon placement to reflect tactical priorities would be a solid improvement!
- TAC Speed and boost, certainly a drop ship required more?  Thanks so much for the little bit of boost!

- Prowler Health Nerf – The Prowler unexpectedly lost half its body HP, dropping from 40,000 to 20,000. Was this an accident? Considering CIG previously agreed that drop ships should be tougher, this seems like an odd change. Some players joked that this might signal another Prowler variant or similar ship being introduced, but honestly, it didn’t feel funny to me. A reason for the change would be great so we can better understand the logic behind it.  I see you have made several attempts to fix the hull.  I do not completely understand it, but it seems to be much better!
Lock out NON-Party Players from our ships.  I think this is self explanatory.
- Vehicle Deployment via Cargo Lift – Being able to summon vehicles using the cargo lift would be an incredible quality-of-life improvement right now.
Some feedback would be awesome, so we know whether these issues are on the radar.

They did in fact communicate on both of these Issues. Several times. If you bothered to follow dev tracker you'd known this but you chose to ignore everything that cig says . Jared flat out said that 4.2 was targeted 2 weeks from the release of the video. Basic math will tell you we are still a week away from that.  You are not entitled to more than that information.  Especially when they flat out told you in dec that no news is no news. You demand communication and ignore the communication when you get it.. if you are going to talk about intelligence prove that you have the bare basic intelligence required to read a post or listen to a video.

Since you seem to be having trouble understanding simple language, I'll highlight some details. If you STILL cannot understand the message I posted for CIG, then you're on your own. I'm not your English teacher, and I don't get paid to tutor you.
Whether you're ignoring the PU, or sapping resources from PU servers to give to the PTU, I don't know, but the PU is degrading quickly.
I am asking for some communication from you guys.
If you're going to wait until Wed-Thurs next week when Jared implied the patch would drop...then you need to do something about the degradation in the PU THIS week.
THIS is the core of the message. Boiled down, it simply amounts to "Communicate with the community."
THIS:
If you're planning to drop 4.2 this week, then you need to speak up and let people know.

Which is the sole part of my post you are obsessed with, and seemingly intellectually incapable of divorcing yourself from in the same way a petulant child obsesses over the ONE cookie he saw, ignoring that in the other hand there are TWO cookies he could have, is simply an alternative possible outcome of events, however unlikely.
Rich coming from someone demanding cig tell him something they already told him a week ago. Probably should follow your own advice. Since you got your answer on the 5th.
Please, continue to reinforce that you're incapable of understanding the English language.
What's the old adage? It's better to keep your mouth shut and let people think you're an idiot, then to open your mouth and remove all doubt.

I don't know... why is everything just a 'Potential Fix'? Why isn't CIG able to fix things conclusively? And all this fancy, shiny new stuff is cool, wow and everything, but how about fixing hangar elevators and quantum and the inventory? I also don't get why this community just accepts the worst game inventory in the history if the gaming industry. The inventory is an pain in the a$$, an absolute pain, and all they do is fumble around at the way how to swap armor. CIG sells storm breaker as sandbox and exploring, what a joke. To say it's an alpha is an argument that just doesn't count anymore. They said this would be the year of playability. Well I don't see much of that yet, and it is June. I am just one player, so I don't matter, but in my case the negative things are starting to outweigh the positive things in this game.
polaris pilot s10 torp control ever?

Your post demands answers that cig fave you at the beginning of June. Stop demanding answer when you flat out ignore cig when they tell you the date the patch drops. 2 weeks from June 5 is June 19. Typical patch release is a Thursday or Friday.  The 19th is a Thursday.

It's always appreciated when people who only read the last line of a post provide commentary that ignores the rest of the post. It's kinda like when someone walks down the street pointing to the one patch of blue sky off in the distance, but completely ignores the torrential rain cloud overhead.
Yeah, the information is technically correct, but utterly useless in the context of what's going on.
